description: General design information about the building
title: GeneralDesignData

CrossDock.description: True if there is docking on both sides of the building

NorthDockLength.description: Length of the North dock if CrossDock is true

ClearHeightLocation.description: Grid line where the clear height starts.

RoofPitch.description: If the roof is single or double sloped

RoofPeakLocation.description: Location on the building where the roof is the highest

FMGlobalInsured.description: True if the building is FM Global Insured
